Strength.description: Bodily Power and Endurance - important for Renegades and Rangers

Speed.description: Agility, balance, and reflexes - important for Commandos and Infantry

Smarts.description: Awareness, Mental Acuity, Intuition, and Analysis - important for Technicians

Social.description: Confidence, Poise, Charisma, and Leadership - important for Officers and Vanguards
